vsParam:
Hmm, is that Tandrion?
What's he doing squatting over there?

I bet he's doing something unspeakable, huh?
After all, that's Tandrion we are talking about...
H, how could it be? Captain won't do anything like that!
Then why are you peeping at him, too...
Ah! I think he just picks something up!

Oh, dear kitty.
Don't be afraid.

Wow, Tandrion is holding a cat!
I am surprised!

I, I am so envious... No,
he's so suspicious...

Hey, [px] and you guys. Come here!
I know you are there.

Hmm!?
H, how do you know!?

Ho. A real guard
can sense the atmosphere around him.
Come on, what's the real reason?

You were so loud, anyone could have discovered you.
Were you trying to hide or not?

Hmm, that's true...
So, what are you doing here?

Er, I am rescuing a cat.
It seems lost, and ran into the Academy.

That's my captain! Not only do you protect students in the
Academy, but also animals, you are a role model to all guards!

Guys! We doubted captain's noble character earlier,
let's apologize to him!

Yeah. I'll look after it here,
you guys go get some food for it!

Er~ I must become someone like the captain one day...
Uh, where are you guys? Ah, hey!? Wait for me!!

Tandrion! We bring some food for the cat.
Is this okay?

Er, I think it'll like it.
Come, you are hungry, aren't you?

Hehe, it eats so fast.
It must be very hungry.

Er, I bathed it while waiting for you.
It's pretty, isn't it?

This has nothing to do with my preference...
Don't you feel sorry for it when you saw it getting so dirty?
Turns out Tandrion has a gentle heart...

What do you mean by "turns out".
I am always gentle, aren't I?
You attitude now is so fake...

That's your illusion.
Okay, dear kitty. Eat slowly, just take your time.

Wow, Tandrion!
Why is there a kitty?

Er, I think it accidentally ran in the Academy.
I found it starving, so I am feeding it.
No no no, anyone would do the same thing, right?

So he only takes care of the cat to please girls.
That's the truth, gee...

Ha-ha. I was wondering.
This is the true Tandrion.
